text: iṉṉum aṟiyātavarkaḷ kūṟukiṟārkaḷ; "allāh ēṉ nam'miṭam pēcavillai, mēlum, namakku ēṉ attāṭci varavillai?" Eṉṟu. Ivarkaḷukku muṉṉar iruntavarkaḷum ippaṭiyē - ivarkaḷiṉ coṟkaḷaippōlavē - tāṉ kūṟiṉārkaḷ. Ivarkaḷiṉ itayaṅkaḷ avarkaḷuṭaiya itayaṅkaḷaip pōṉṟavaiyē tāṉ. Īmāṉil uṟutiyuṭaiya makkaḷukku nam attāṭcikaḷai (avarkaḷ maṉatil patiyumpaṭi) nām niccayamākat teḷivāy vivarittuḷḷōm
